page.title: 08ABERDEEN: A CHILD'S TOY.
page.content:
Lego is a construction toy. It is probably the most successful toy in the world today.
Lego is made of small plastic pieces that can be pressed together to make anything you wish. It is sold in kits which contain lots of different pieces. Most of the pieces are square or rectangular although there are also wheels, triangular roof pieces and clear bits that can be used for windows. Lego is made in Denmark.
Both boys and girls play with Lego. There is a more advanced type of Lego called Technical Lego. This can be used to make engines and gears. Lego can be used by children from about the age of three. Technical Lego is for older children - from about 10 years old.
